name: Nine Lives - Demo
description:
This is a puzzle game where you must find innovative ways to use your extra lives to progress through over 90 levels.

Currently you can play through the demo which has 20 different levels and introduces many different elements and mechanics.

Features
  • Progress through 9 different areas each adding a new twist.
  • Solve over 90 puzzles ranging from the very casual to the very challenging.
  • Use upto 9 lives to help solve increasingly challenging puzzles.
  • Cute voxel art style with a different theme for each of the nine areas.
  • Face dangerous throny plants, catch sneaky rats, drown yourself in rivers and encounter much more as you make your way back to the wold of the living.
